languages.text: "В отличие от тебя, я не вожу дружбы с ксеносами. Я их использую". {n}Каллигос взмахивает топором в сторону сслита.{/n} "Или убиваю. Смерть ксеноса есть высшее благо, а проявлять милосердие к врагам Человечества не в моем характере".

traits.locale_text: "В отличие от тебя, я не вожу дружбы с ксеносами. Я их использую". {n}Каллигос взмахивает топором в сторону сслита.{/n} "Или убиваю. Смерть ксеноса есть высшее благо, а проявлять милосердие к врагам Человечества не в моем характере".

languages.text: "Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos — I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Humanity is not in my nature."
languages.original_text: "В отличие от тебя, я не вожу дружбы с ксеносами. Я их использую". {n}Каллигос взмахивает топором в сторону сслита.{/n} "Или убиваю. Смерть ксеноса есть высшее благо, а проявлять милосердие к врагам Человечества не в моем характере".

traits.locale_text: "Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos – I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Mankind isn't in my nature."

"Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos – I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Mankind isn't in my nature."

"Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos – I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Mankind isn't in my nature."

"Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos – I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Mankind isn't in my nature."

"Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos — I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Humanity is not in my nature."

"Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos — I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Humanity is not in my nature."

languages.text: «A diferencia de usted, yo no trabo amistad con los xenos: los utilizo». {n}Calligos señala con su hacha al Sslyth.{/n} «O los mato. La muerte de un xenos es por el bien supremo, y mostrar piedad con los enemigos de la Humanidad no está en mi naturaleza».
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos — I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Humanity is not in my nature."

traits.locale_text: «A diferencia de usted, yo no trabo amistad con los xenos: los utilizo». {n}Calligos señala con su hacha al sslyth.{/n} «O los mato. La muerte de un xenos es por el bien supremo, y mostrar piedad con los enemigos de la Humanidad no está en mi naturaleza».

languages.text: “我可不像你。我从来不和异形交朋友，我只会利用他们。”{n}卡里戈斯朝蛇人的方向挥了挥斧子。{/n}“或是杀了他们。杀死异形就是最高的美德，我可不会仁慈对待人类之敌。”
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos — I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Humanity is not in my nature."

traits.locale_text: “我可不像你。我从来不和异形交朋友，我只会利用他们。”{n}卡里戈斯朝蛇人的方向挥了挥斧子。{/n}“或是杀了他们。杀死异型就是最高的美德，我可不会仁慈对待人类之敌。”

languages.text: « Contrairement à vous, je ne fais pas ami-ami avec les xénos. Je me sers d'eux ou je les tue, {n}dit Calligos en désignant le Sslyth de sa hache.{/n} Tuer les xénos constitue le summum du bien, et je ne suis pas du genre à faire preuve de clémence envers les ennemis de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos — I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Humanity is not in my nature."

traits.locale_text: « Contrairement à vous, je ne fais pas ami-ami avec les xénos. Je me sers d'eux ou je les tue, {n}dit Calligos en désignant le Sslyth de sa hache.{/n} Tuer les xénos constitue le summum du bien, et je ne suis pas du genre à faire preuve de clémence envers les ennemis de l'humanité. »

languages.text: 「お前と違って、俺は異種族と友にはならない…俺はヤツらを利用する」{n}カリゴスは斧をススリスに向かって振る。{/n}「あるいは殺す。異種族の死は至高の善であり、人類の敵に慈悲を示すことは俺の本性ではない」
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos — I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Humanity is not in my nature."

traits.locale_text: 「お前と違って、俺はゼノと友にはならない…俺はヤツらを利用する」{n}カリゴスは斧をススリスに向かって振る。{/n}「あるいは殺す。ゼノの死は至高の善であり、人類の敵に慈悲を示すことは俺の本性ではない」

languages.text: "Im Gegensatz zu Euch freunde ich mich nicht mit Xenos an — ich nutze sie aus." {n}Calligos winkt mit der Axt in Richtung des Sslyth.{/n} "Oder töte sie. Der Tod von Xenos ist das oberste Gute, und den Feinden der Menschheit Gnade zu erweisen, liegt nicht in meiner Natur."
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I don't make friends with xenos — I use them." {n}Calligos waves his axe in the direction of the Sslyth.{/n} "Or kill them. The death of xenos is the supreme good, and showing mercy to the enemies of Humanity is not in my nature."

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegensatz zu Euch freunde ich mich nicht mit Xenos an — ich nutze sie aus." {n}Calligos winkt mit der Axt in Richtung des Sslyth.{/n} "Oder töte sie. Der Tod von Xenos ist das oberste Gute, und den Feinden der Menschheit Gnade zu erweisen, liegt nicht in meiner Natur."
